section.37: The Book of Fighting [The Prohibition of Bloodshed]

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Sa'eed bin Zaid said:"The Messenger of Allah [SAW] said: 'Whoever is killed protecting his wealth, he is a martyr. Whoever is killed protecting his family, he is a martyr. Whoever is killed protecting his religion, he is a martyr. Whoever is killed protecting himself, he is a martyr
